purpose: Automate browser-based workflows using advanced AI techniques
principle: Integrates Large Language Models (LLMs) with Computer Vision to interact and automate tasks within web browsers

limitations: May encounter limitations with dynamic web content, requires specific browser configurations
name: skyvern
